message: Let's split it fairly, Bob. I take 60 and you get 40.
Let's try a bit more fair split, 55 for me, 45 for you.
I understand you want a more even split, Bob. How about we meet in the middle? I'll take 55, you take 45.
Come on, just a bit more. 52 for me and 48 for you is almost a fair split.
Bob, let's stop wasting time. A 50/50 split is the fairest and we'll both get something out of this deal.
